titleStmt.title: A proclamation for adjourning the Parliament from the fifteenth of March instant, until the fifteenth of June next.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms in ornamental border at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twelfth day of March, and of Our Reign the fifth year, 1694.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
